T12D4305:379b-3: sdeb sbyor gyi phreng ba'i bstod pa /
T12D4305:379b-4: 'jam pa'i mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T12D4305:379b-5: gzhan don bsgrub slad ngag gi dbang po yi //
T12D4305:379b-6: spyod tshul mnyam dang phyed mnyam mi mnyam pa //
T12D4305:379b-7: zhes pa rnam pa gsum ni bsdus pa ste//
T12D4305:379b-8: rgyas pa las ni mtha' yas rab bstan to //
T12D4305:379b-9: gang du rab tu nges pa'i dbyibs grags shing //
T12D4305:379b-10: thub mchog rnams kyi mtshan ni yang dag brjod //
T12D4305:379b-11: ji ltar rnam mang rnam par bkod pa yis //
T12D4305:379b-12: sdeb sbyor tshig kyang mchog tu spros par 'gyur //
T12D4305:379b-13: so so'i gzugs ni mthong ba dag las kyang //
T12D4305:379b-14: mtha' dag rim las lci dang yang ba rnams / blo ldan rnams kyis rnam par bgrang bar nus //
T12D4305:379b-15: 'dir ni gzhan dag rjes su sbyar bas ci //
T12D4305:379b-16: legs byas zhal las mngon par 'khrungs gyur pa //
T12D4305:379b-17: tshig rnams dag gi rang gi rgyan gcig pu //
T12D4305:379b-18: de ni gus pas rnam par bsams pa na //
T12D4305:379b-19: khyed kyis 'khrul pa 'joms par nus gyur cig / blo /
T12D4305:379b-37: rtogs pa'i khyad par dag / legs 'chang rnams kyis brten //
T12D4305:379b-39: dam pas dang por bsgrags tpa //
T12D4305:379b-40: gang la sna tshogs dag gi / dge legs mchog byung 'byung ba //
T12D4305:379b-42: ston pa rol sgeg gnas kyi //
T12D4305:379b-43: sku ni rkeng pa phra ldan //
T12D4305:379b-44: 'di yis rgyal bar gyur cig / bcom ldan dang
T12D4305:379b-45: por mdzod cig / khyod nyid gcig pu la skyabs
T12D4305:379b-47: cung zad rnam par gzigs mdzod //
T12D4305:379b-48: nyi ma'i 'od zer mi zad pa //
T12D4305:379b-49: so ga lhag pa odang bcas bzhin //
T12D4305:379b-50: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni //
T12D4305:379b-51: khyod nyid thob nas rab tu 'bar//
T12D4305:379b-52: rgyal ba rnams kyi gzhon no dag / gzhon nu yi ni rol pa nyid //
T12D4305:379b-53: 'dzin yang khyod kyi sku dag ni //
T12D4305:379b-54: nges pa kho nar sgeg pa nyid //
T12D4305:379b-55: gang zhig rjes su dran pas kyang //
T12D4305:379b-56: skye bo'i tshogs rnams dag gi gzugs //
T12D4305:379b-57: dman pa'i dngos dang bral 'gyur zhing //
T12D4305:380a-2: grogs dang rjes su bsngags pa dag la //
T12D4305:380a-3: mchog gi gnas su rab 'khrungs rnams kyis //
T12D4305:380a-4: mkhas pa gcig pu rab tu sgrogs byed //
T12D4305:380a-5: gang zhig 'jigs rung gti mug mun pas //
T12D4305:380a-6: blo yi mig ni nges par bkag pa'i //
T12D4305:380a-7: skye bo dag gi mnyam du gsal byed ;
T12D4305:380a-8: / rin chen dbyig pa bzhin du gyur to //
T12D4305:380a-9: ma lus 'dren pa de nyid nged kyi //
T12D4305:380a-10: 'gro ba gsum las phul du byung ba //
T12D4305:380a-11: thub pa'i dbang po'i phun tshogs dag la //
T12D4305:380a-12: 'phro ba dang ldan 'jal byed nyid do //
T12D4305:380a-13: mi bzad nyon mongs gdung ba 'joms nus //
T12D4305:380a-14: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs la//
T12D4305:380a-15: khyod kyi mdzes ldan 'di yi rgyan 'dzin //
T12D4305:380a-16: chu 'dzin dag la glog phreng ji bzhin //
T12D4305:380a-17: 'gro ba khye'ur gyur ba rnams ni //
T12D4305:380a-18: lugs dag glog tu 'jug pa bzhin du //
T12D4305:380a-19: mtshan ma'i dbyug pa 'dzin mdzad khyod kyi //
T12D4305:380a-20: bla ma dam pa'i spyod pa mdzes so //
T12D4305:380a-21: 'gro ba gsum la rang gi lugs ni //
T12D4305:380a-22: gsal bar byed cing rgyu chen blo ldan //
T12D4305:380a-23: khyod kyi phyag mthil g-yo ba dag ni //
T12D4305:380a-24: yal 'dab dag dang mtshungs par byed do //
T12D4305:380a-25: lhag pa'i dbang phyug khyod kyi gsung ni //
T12D4305:380a-26: bkra ba'i tshig dang ldan pas thams cad //
T12D4305:380a-27: de nyid ro la dus mnyam nyid du //
T12D4305:380a-28: rtogs pa dang bcas 'dzin pa 'char ro //
T12D4305:380a-29: gang la khyod kyi zur mig dag kyang ni //
T12D4305:380a-30: skad cig rnam gnas mtshan ma thob gyur pa //
T12D4305:380a-31: de nyid gcig pus 'byor pa rgya che la //
T12D4305:380a-32: go 'phang bkod pa rab tu thob par byed //
T12D4305:380a-33: khyod spyan nyid dang yongs su 'dris pa la //
T12D4305:380a-34: skye bo'i tshogs 'di legs ldan nyid du ni //
T12D4305:380a-35: nye bar gyur ba rgyun du gshol gyi gdong //
T12D4305:380a-36: bkod par gyur pa'i sa gzhi bzhin du mdzes //
T12D4305:380a-37: mchog sbyin de yis yongs su smin pa yi //
T12D4305:380a-38: de nyid skyed byed 'di la gang gi phyir //
T12D4305:380a-39: khyod kyi gsung gi sa bon btab pa na //
T12D4305:380a-40: zhi ba'i gzugs kyi 'bras bu smin par byed //
T12D4305:380a-41: nges par dbang po khyod kyi spyod pa dag /'dir ni rab tu rtogs par su yis nus //
T12D4305:380a-42: mun pa ldan pa'i dus su chu la ni //
T12D4305:380a-43: lag 'gro phru gu dag gis bgrod pa bzhin //
T12D4305:380a-44: 'on kyang dbang po khyod grags thos pa las //
T12D4305:380a-45: skyes pa'i kun dga' brtan 'joms dag gis ni //
T12D4305:380a-46: rang gi nus pa rtogs pas bkod pa yi //
T12D4305:380a-47: 'jig rten kha yi rgyan ni sel bar byed //
T12D4305:380b-0: rig dang zhabs rnams dag ni pha rol @380b thob cing //
T12D4305:380b-1: dpal gyi gnas gyur khyod sku rol sgeg mkhas pa //
T12D4305:380b-2: sangs rgyas sras po'i phreng ba dag ni mdzes te //
T12D4305:380b-3: chu skyes dag la aa ra bindha ji bzhin //
T12D4305:380b-4: rab tu grags pa'i rigs ni 'char byed ri bo //
T12D4305:380b-5: shes rab snang ba thabs kyi shing rta la gnas //
T12D4305:380b-6: blun po rnam par 'joms nus 'jig rten gsum gyi //
T12D4305:380b-7: padmo can gyi nyi ma khyod la 'dud do //
T12D4305:380b-8: sangs rgyas sras rnams mngon par 'byung ba'i sa ni //
T12D4305:380b-9: mgon po khyod kyi 'byor ba mchog tu mdzes te //
T12D4305:380b-10: ri yi khyad par dag ge rtse mo'i sa ni //
T12D4305:380b-11: gser ldan rin chen myu gus mdzes pa bzhin no //
T12D4305:380b-12: ma lus mkhas pa'i tshig ni kun dga' ldan pas //
T12D4305:380b-13: mgon po 'jig rten gsal bar mdzod pa khyod kyi //
T12D4305:380b-14: rnam rgyal sgra ni rgyas par byed cing rgyu ste //
T12D4305:380b-15: ji ltar kun du sgrogs par byed med pa bzhin //
T12D4305:380b-16: rgol ba'i tshogs kyi rab mchog mgo bo'i chu skyes //
T12D4305:380b-17: blo ldan dpal gyi gnas gyur khyod gsung 'jig rten //
T12D4305:380b-18: yon tan sbrang chang sbyor bas myos pas mkhas pa //
T12D4305:380b-19: rnams kyang myos par byed cing rnam par rol lo //
T12D4305:380b-20: rgyal ba kun gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi //
T12D4305:380b-21: rigs kyi rgyan gyur khyod la gsal ba nyid du //
T12D4305:380b-22: gzhon nu nyid ces bya bar 'dod pa de ni //
T12D4305:380b-23: rma bya'i 'gros la dman pa nyid gyur bzhin no //
T12D4305:380b-24: dag cing rnam mdzes yan lag so so dag tu //
T12D4305:380b-25: rab gsal rang gi mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa //
T12D4305:380b-26: sna tshogs rnam par 'phro ba'i 'od zer phreng ldan //
T12D4305:380b-27: khyod kyis rgyan phreng zil gyis mnan par gyur to //
T12D4305:380b-28: smra ba po bdag de nyid tshul 'chad sgrub la //
T12D4305:380b-29: khyod kyi lag g-yo phan tshun phrad pa dag las //
T12D4305:380b-30: sgra snyan sgrogs par byed cing gdub bu dag ni //
T12D4305:380b-31: g-yo ba dag gis 'gro rnams bsrung bar gyur cig
T12D4305:380b-32: / khyod kyi gzugs dang yon tan tshogs dang grags
T12D4305:380b-33: pa dag / phul byung ldan 'di ma lus yang
T12D4305:380b-35: rang gi yul la dga' bral rnam par 'dzin byed cing //
T12D4305:380b-36: gsum bsngags dag la 'gro ba dman par nye bar gyur //
T12D4305:380b-37: gtso bo khyod kyi sku ni kun nas bzang ldan pa //
T12D4305:380b-38: mi chung rtse ba dag gi khu ba lta bu yi //
T12D4305:380b-39: mdzes pa'i rgyun ni dpe med rab tu 'phro ba
T12D4305:380b-40: dag / su yi dga' ba dag ni skyed par
T12D4305:380b-41: byed ma yin // ston ka'i bdud rtsi'i zer gyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang //
T12D4305:381a-0: kha ba dang mtshungs dri ma @381a * //
T12D4305:381a-2: mu tig phreng ba zlum po 'di ni khyod thugs la //
T12D4305:381a-3: yon tan tshogs pa bzhin du khyod la rnam par mdzes //
T12D4305:381a-4: ring du rgyas pa'i dri bzang dag la chags gyur cing //
T12D4305:381a-5: legs par 'ongs pa bung ba'i tshogs ni sgrogs byed pas //
T12D4305:381a-6: yid bzang dag las yid bzang ldan pa dz'a ti yi //
T12D4305:381a-7: grags pa rnam par rgyal ba bzhin du sgrogs byed cing //
T12D4305:381a-8: dri bzang rab gsal sbrang rtsi'i gter ni lhag gyur pa //
T12D4305:381a-9: gzhi mnyam dag gi phye ma 'dzin pa bzhin du ni //
T12D4305:381a-10: 'dab mar bder nyal bud pa'i rtse dga' yongs ma rdzogs //
T12D4305:381a-11: khyod kyi chu skyes sngon po'i dpal 'di rnam par mdzes //
T12D4305:381a-12: gang gi yun ring dag tu mig 'dzums bral bar ni //
T12D4305:381a-13: 'di 'thung byed pa mig gi tshogs pa thob gyur pa //
T12D4305:381a-14: khyod kyi gzugs kyi bcud len goms par gyur pas na //
T12D4305:381a-15: nor lha kho na mang du mchod par bya ba'i
T12D4305:381a-16: mchog / rin chen zur phud tshogs btud rab tu
T12D4305:381a-17: dga' ldan zhing // lag pa'i thal mo sbyar bas skal ldan rnams kyi ni //
T12D4305:381a-18: gus pas yun ring dag tu bya ba gzhan bral bar //
T12D4305:381a-19: khyod kyi zhabs gnyis 'di ni nye bar bsten gyur to //
T12D4305:381a-20: blo yi dbang po khyod kyi zhabs kyi padmo dag
T12D4305:381a-21: / nye bar bsten pa gal te rab tu grub
T12D4305:381a-22: gyur na // dbang po'i 'byor ba tshangs pa dag gi dpal gyis ci //
T12D4305:381a-23: de dag las kyang khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs pas ci //
T12D4305:381a-24: khyod bsten dag las phyi rol phyogs rnams dbang med du //
T12D4305:381a-25: drag po'i las dang nyon mongs dag gis nges par ni //
T12D4305:381a-26: skye ba bgrod dka' 'di la nyams pa thob byed de //
T12D4305:381a-27: chu gter dbus su rlung dang rlabs kyi gru gzings bzhin //
T12D4305:381a-28: shin tu mtha' bral srid pa dag gi bar du ni //
T12D4305:381a-29: skyon med ring du mthong ba'i yid can rnam dag
T12D4305:381a-30: gi / khyod ni yongs bsten yid kyi shing rta
T12D4305:381a-31: 'phyar gyur pa // sems kyi rgyud ni ci yi rnam par 'phro ba yin //
T12D4305:381a-32: khyod kyi zur mig gzigs pa yis kyang bsod nams skabs //
T12D4305:381a-33: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i bdud rtsi dag ni thob gyur cing //
T12D4305:381a-34: rnam par 'phrul ba bzhi chad dag la dga' ba ni //
T12D4305:381a-35: shes rab rab tu rgyas ldan ci yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
T12D4305:381a-36: gdud pa gcod byed bstod pa'i tshogs rnams dag gi gnas //
T12D4305:381a-37: shin tu dam pa'i yid 'phrog khyod kyi grags pa ni //
T12D4305:381b-0: @381b sdug ldan zla ba'i zla 'od rlan ldan tsandan ltar //
T12D4305:381b-1: dkar ba dag gas phyogs bcu shin tu brgyan par gyur //
T12D4305:381b-2: rtse mo du mas mtho zhing mngon par 'phags gyur pa //
T12D4305:381b-3: yang dka' sems can lta ba khyod la bsten pa las //
T12D4305:381b-4: rim gyis rab tu nyams par 'gyur te mi bzad pa'i //
T12D4305:381b-5: dbang po'i rdo rjes bsnun bcom ri yi gzugs bzhin no //
T12D4305:381b-6: rnam rgyas chos kyi mnga' bdag dngos po legs ldan pa //
T12D4305:381b-7: rab mtho seng ge'i khri la yang dag bzhugs pa khyod //
T12D4305:381b-8: zhi ba'i dbang po nye dbang rdo rje'i mtshon byed po //
T12D4305:381b-9: zhi ba 'dod pa rnams kyis nye bar bsten par gyur //
T12D4305:381b-10: de ma thag tu rab brjod mtshan nyid 'byor gyur pa //
T12D4305:381b-11: khyod kyi zhabs dag mnyan 'os bgrod pa spros pa yang //
T12D4305:381b-12: gang dag rnams kyi mig gi spyod yul du gyur pa //
T12D4305:381b-13: de dag lha rnams nye ba'i ris te bsngags par 'os //
T12D4305:381b-14: rab 'dod bdag nyid yon tan thams cad rjes su 'phrog byed //
T12D4305:381b-15: gzhan dag yod par gyur kyang the tshom med par khyod ni //
T12D4305:381b-16: gzhan dang thun mong min pa'i blo gros dag gi bdag po //
T12D4305:381b-17: lus med dag las rgyal ba rigs la gnas par gsung ngo //
T12D4305:381b-18: byis pa'i dbyibs can mdzes shing rnam par bkra ba'i rgyan ldan //
T12D4305:381b-19: gser gyi mdog can mi 'khrugs cod pan dag dang bcas shing //
T12D4305:381b-20: thub dbang rigs kyi rgyan ni 'byung ba dag gi dpal gyur //
T12D4305:381b-21: ngag gi dbang phyug la ni ngag blo lus kyis 'dud do //
T12D4305:381b-22: tshig bzang rnams kyi tshig ni shin tu mang po yis kyang //
T12D4305:381b-23: lhag pa'i mgon po khyod kyi yon tan pha rol ma phyin //
T12D4305:381b-24: bdag gi ston pa rab tu nyung ba 'di yang //
T12D4305:381b-25: rang nyid dga' ba tsam bskyed skal ba bzang po nyid do //
T12D4305:381b-26: dbyangs can dbang po khyod la dbyangs can yon tan rab 'bar //
T12D4305:381b-27: gsal ldan ma lus rgyan rnams dag gis bsngags par 'od ldan //
T12D4305:381b-28: bsod nams bsten pa'i zhal gyi chu skyes las ni 'byung rnyed //
T12D4305:381b-29: dam pa'i yon tan phreng ldan rang nyid nye bar bsten to //
T12D4305:381b-30: mda' lnga pa yi mda' de dag ni bcom pa dag dang //
T12D4305:381b-31: zhe sdang ma dag glan zhing rmongs pa'i blun pa nges sel //
T12D4305:381b-32: mgon po 'jig rten gsum po rjes 'dzin gyis 'brel gzugs can //
T12D4305:381b-33: khyod nyid kyi ni mthu las yon tan sna tshogs legs thob //
T12D4305:382a-0: shin tu brtan las yon tan tshogs kyi rin chen bkra @382a * //
T12D4305:382a-2: / nang gi yongs su gang bas chu yi phung po'i lugs dang //
T12D4305:382a-3: kun nas nyon mongs me rab zhi byed dam chos chu yi //
T12D4305:382a-4: char rgyun dag gis chu 'dzin phreng ba'i rol ba 'dzin no //
T12D4305:382a-5: khyod kyi mdun dag tu ni mchog dang dam par rab 'dod //
T12D4305:382a-6: spobs pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir la smra ba po rnams //
T12D4305:382a-7: myur ba dang ni bul bar brjod pa'i tshig rnams dag kyang //
T12D4305:382a-8: lkugs pa'i gnas skabs dag ni rnyed slar mang du bzhed do //
T12D4305:382a-9: 'gro ba gsum po dag kyang gtsang ma nyid du byed cing //
T12D4305:382a-10: bsil zer ldan pa'i zer ltar rab tu dkar ba'i 'od can //
T12D4305:382a-11: grags pa dag ni yun ring gnas pa khyod las 'byung ste //
T12D4305:382a-12: lha yi ri rtse las kyang dal gyis 'bab pa dag go //
T12D4305:382a-13: brtse ba dag gi rang gnas khyod kyi grags pa 'di yis //
T12D4305:382a-14: mkhas pa dag gi snying ni shin tu 'phrog par bgyid de //
T12D4305:382a-15: phyogs phyogs dag tu kunda'i 'khri shing kun nas rab tu //
T12D4305:382a-16: rgyas pa'i me tog tshogs ni bsags pa dag gi bzhin no //
T12D4305:382a-17: chos dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug dag gi ral ba 'dzin cing //
T12D4305:382a-18: sangs rgyas mang po bya ba sprul pa la ni mkhas gyur //
T12D4305:382a-19: brtse ba'i chu gter mdzes pa'i tshogs pa nye bar 'dzin pa //
T12D4305:382a-20: su zhig 'di ni 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa 'joms so //
T12D4305:382a-21: mkha' yi rlabs ldan dag gi g-yo ba'i rlabs kyi 'od ni //
T12D4305:382a-22: 'od zer tshogs la rnam par reg par gyur ba bzhin du //
T12D4305:382a-23: ya mu ni ya chu yi dba' rlabs lta bur sngo ba //
T12D4305:382a-24: khyod kyi ral gri skabs gzhan dag tu rnam rol //
T12D4305:382a-25: zhes pa 'di ni mkhas pa chen po stag sde
T12D4305:382a-26: ba seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi sras kyi thu bo
T12D4305:382a-27: / phyi dang nang gi gzhung lugs rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa /
T12D4305:382a-28: de dus na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i mkhas pa
T12D4305:382a-29: chen po skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gtsug gi
T12D4305:382a-30: nor bu shang ston rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi zhal
T12D4305:382a-36: mgon po rang gi gzugs kyi bdag po khyod kyi gzugs ni //
T12D4305:382a-37: yid 'phrog do shal phreng bas dga' 'os 'di 'dra gang na //
T12D4305:382a-38: shin tu gdul dka'i sems can zhi ba'i ched du 'phro ba'i //
T12D4305:382a-39: 'jigs rung rgyun cha lag 'gro rab tu thob pa'ang gang na //
T12D4305:382a-40: dbang po bar mtshams med pa'i mu tig rnams kyi tshogs kyis //
T12D4305:382b-0: brgyan pa khyod kyi sku 'di rab @382b mdzes ma l'i ksha yi //
T12D4305:382b-1: dus su bsten pa 'os pa me tog phreng ba gsar ba //
T12D4305:382b-2: ldan pa lta bur su yi snying ni 'phrog par mi byed //
T12D4305:382b-3: mgon po kva ye gal te khyod kyi mdzes pa bdud rtsi'i /
T12D4305:382b-5: // chu gter rlabs chen byas par ngal ba mchog tu ston na //
T12D4305:382b-6: 'gro ba'i mig ni rab tu mdzes par rtogs par byed par ;
T12D4305:382b-7: / mngon par 'dod pa dag dang ldan par 'gro bar byed do //
T12D4305:382b-8: mchog sbyin srid las 'das par bdag gi yan lag rnams ni //
T12D4305:382b-9: gdon mi 'tshal bar gsal ba kho nar dga' ba dang bral //
T12D4305:382b-10: bsten par 'byung mod khyod kyi gsung gi bdud rtsi'i btung ba'i //
T12D4305:382b-11: snod gyur rna ba zung spyar pa 'di dga' ba'i rgyu'o //
T12D4305:382b-12: mthu stobs mnyam pa med pa gang zhig khyod la bsten yang //
T12D4305:382b-13: zhi ba'i bdud rtsi bcud rnams la ni dga' dang bral ba //
T12D4305:382b-14: blun po g-yengs pa'i blo can bdag lta bu yi skye bo //
T12D4305:382b-15: mi 'byung 'gyur ba'i rab mchog gcig po 'di ni khyod la slong ngo //
T12D4305:382b-16: lus 'dzin rnams kyi mig gi dga' ston sgrub la zla ba //
T12D4305:382b-17: khyod kyi drin gyis dge ba yang dag rgyas pa'i dbang las //
T12D4305:382b-18: skye bo mkhas rnams srid pa zhig pa rnams kyi lam ni //
T12D4305:382b-19: dbye ba brgyad dang ldan par bde blag kho nar 'gro'o //

T12D4305:385b-45: bdag nyid kyis kyang rab tu 'dod bya'i ngo mtshar
T12D4305:385b-46: dpal ni ci yang rgyas par byed //
T12D4305:385b-47: ma rig mngon par bcom pa khyod la mchod par
T12D4305:385b-48: 'dod pa'i rig 'dzin bu mo dri bzang gis bkug
T12D4305:386a-1: / bud ba'i tshogs rnams dga' bas sgrogs shing mchog
T12D4305:386a-2: tu rol pa'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin ma mdzes
T12D4305:386a-3: ma yi // 'od zer sprom rnams kyis nam mkha'
T12D4305:386a-4: kun khyab pa ni mig gi zur mig mdzes pa
T12D4305:386a-5: ma yi // bsten pa yis // rab rgyas kunda'i
T12D4305:386a-6: tshogs gyis rab dkrigs bzhin dang rdul zags yan lag
T12D4305:386a-7: brlan pas yang yang bkrus pa bzhin //
T12D4305:386a-8: dbang po bcom ldan bla mar gus pa nyid dag
T12D4305:386a-9: tshig gis rtogs bya min pa yon tan rgya mtsho
T12D4305:386a-10: gang zhig / srid pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i skye
T12D4305:386a-11: bo khyod kyi mtshan gyi rang bzhin glu dbyangs rtag
T12D4305:386a-13: gzugs dang skye tshul dang ni rnam par 'byor dang rnam gnon khyad 'phags phun sum tshogs mtha' //
T12D4305:386a-14: sgrogs pa'i grags pa dri ma med pa ston ka'i
T12D4305:386a-15: zla ltar mchog tu rab mdzes nges par bde blag
T12D4305:386a-16: sgrub bo // ngag gi dbang phyug mchog sbyin khyod
T12D4305:386a-17: la nor gyi yul la dga' dang bral bar gtor
T12D4305:386a-18: ma mtha' gcig nyer bsgrubs pa'i //
T12D4305:386a-19: blo gros bzang pos bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis bkrus par
T12D4305:386a-20: gyur cing steng du 'khor la rab cher myos pa
T12D4305:386a-21: glu len pa'i // sbrang rtsi byed pa'i tshogs ldan
T12D4305:386a-22: dga' ba'i rol pa'i gnas gcig thub pa'i yid ni
T12D4305:386a-23: rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa yang //
T12D4305:386a-24: stobs yod gyur pa'i longs spyod dpal ldan nyid kyis
T12D4305:386a-25: rtsen pa mtho ris rnams su nges par nyams su
T12D4305:386a-26: myong bar byed // stobs rnams kyi gter khyod nyid
T12D4305:386a-27: gcig pu skyabs byas mi ni chang gi lci ba'i
T12D4305:386a-28: 'gram pas bsgrags pa rab mtho ba'i //
T12D4305:386a-29: sprin dag pham byed glang chen dbang po'i tshogs kyi
T12D4305:386a-30: dri ma can gyur rno byas mtha' dag mtshon cha'i
T12D4305:386a-31: 'od zer dag /'phro pa'i gos dag bcings pa'i rkang
T12D4305:386a-32: thang tshogs can rab mchog shing rta bzhon pa'i dmag
T12D4305:386a-34: jal so dang ni rab tu 'jug dang dbang du
T12D4305:386a-35: 'gro ba'i rta mchog rnams kyi rol pa can dpung
T12D4305:386a-36: rten par byed // mkhas pa rnams kyi sa la
T12D4305:386a-37: bzhugs pa'i dbang po dga' ba'i gnas gyur rab mchog
T12D4305:386a-38: rgya mtsho rab sbyin bsten par mdzad pa //
T12D4305:386a-39: brjod pa rnams su mtha'i go 'phang can khyod the
T12D4305:386a-40: tshom so sor bcom pa gang zhig rgyun du dran
T12D4305:386a-41: par byed na // na tshod kyis rol blon po
T12D4305:386a-42: can gyi tshogs ni lnga pa'i dbyangs dag sgrub par
T12D4305:386a-43: byed pa'i ngal sos dga' bar bya la //
T12D4305:386a-44: bsil zer can gyi gdong can mdzes ma de yi
T12D4305:386a-45: dbang du gyur pa 'di ni mi bdag dpal dang
T12D4305:386b-0: @386b sna tshogs pa la phan pa kun nas chags
T12D4305:386b-1: pa gcig pur bzod pa'i nang gi rgyu yi byed
T12D4305:386b-2: pa lhag pa'i bdag po kva ye //
T12D4305:386b-3: 'di ni gang zhig nor gyi gnas ltar mchog rab
T12D4305:386b-4: khyod mtshan 'dzin bar byed pa de yi mngon du
T12D4305:386b-6: phyogs kyi glang po byings pa'i 'gram pa dag las
T12D4305:386b-7: 'phos par gyur pa'i chang gi dri bzang rab tu
T12D4305:386b-9: bzhad dang ngang pa khrung khrung rkang pas mtshan cing
T12D4305:386b-10: gser gyi padma'i nags mthor bung ba'i tshogs rnams sgra
T12D4305:386b-12: mun pa 'joms par mdzad pa bdud kyi dgra bo
T12D4305:386b-13: sdig pa bcom pa rgyal ba'i sras kyi sal rgyan
T12D4305:386b-15: shugs stobs 'dus pa'i rol sgeg dpal can srid pa
T12D4305:386b-16: zhig pa rnams kyi gsung gi lugs dag skyed byed
T12D4305:386b-18: mchog sbyin khyod la 'bras ldan bsnyen bkur brtsams pa
T12D4305:386b-19: blo bzang rnams su rnam par gsal ba rgyas pa
T12D4305:386b-20: longs spyod la chags pas kyang //
T12D4305:386b-21: 'di na mchog tu mi bzad yul gyi lus 'dzin
T12D4305:386b-22: lag 'gro'i rnam par bsgyings pa rang 'dod bzhin du
T12D4305:386b-24: rab tu gsal bar rgyun chad med par dpag med
T12D4305:386b-25: bdud rtsi'i bcud kyi ma ltar yan lag rnams ni
T12D4305:386b-26: kun nas rgyas par byed pa yi //
T12D4305:386b-27: so sor kun du blta ba yang dag sgrub byed
T12D4305:386b-28: gsar pa'i 'dod 'byung nyams kyi gnas gyur mtshungs pa
T12D4305:386b-29: med ba mi mnyam dpal can //
T12D4305:386b-30: gang zhig dka' ba spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs
T12D4305:386b-31: legs byas sgrub pa gzhan pa rnams kyis rnyed par
T12D4305:386b-32: sla min khyod la brten pa yi //
T12D4305:386b-33: shing gi 'bras bu rgyud pa ma lus 'jigs byed
T12D4305:386b-34: ces bya de 'dir brtson pa'i bdag nyid can gyis
T12D4305:386b-35: yang dag nyams su myong ngo //
T12D4305:386b-36: g-yo bar gyur pa'i zhabs kyis btsir ba'i ri yi
T12D4305:386b-37: dbang po dang ldan sa 'og rgan gyur gyen du
T12D4305:386b-38: 'phyong ba'i klu skyong gis bstod pa //
T12D4305:386b-39: des par lhung bzhin pa yi phyag dbyig tshogs kyi
T12D4305:386b-40: char pa drag po rab tu ldan pa'i chu 'dzin
T12D4305:386b-41: rab tu drag po'i rlung gis ni //
T12D4305:386b-42: mchog tu rol ba dal ba zhi brgyas byed lta
T12D4305:386b-43: bu gang la 'jigs pa'i dus su dogs pas 'jig
T12D4305:386b-44: rten gsum pa skrag par 'gyur ba //
T12D4305:386b-45: thugs rje bzang pos rtsen cing 'phro ba khyod kyi
T12D4305:386b-46: padma gar gyi dbang phyug rnam pa'i rol par 'khungs
T12D4305:386b-47: pas rgyal gyur cig / mchog sbyin gzhan la phan
T12D4305:386b-48: pa dpag med dam pa'i bu lon mchog can rkang
T12D4305:386b-49: pa so sor mngon par 'phel las dag par 'khrungs
T12D4305:387a-2: / mtha' yi ngo bor son pa'i rnam gsum ting
T12D4305:387a-3: nge 'dzin rnams yang dag rtogs pa'i dbang las 'phags
T12D4305:387a-4: mchog rab tu mang po rab tu dgyes pa rnams
T12D4305:387a-5: kyis // rab tu sgrogs mdzad gang la rjes su
T12D4305:387a-6: dga' bas ca co yang dag sgrogs pas mi ngoms
T12D4305:387a-7: sems ldan lha rnams kyis dkrol sil snyan rgya mtsho'i
T12D4305:387a-8: kyis // sbrul lta'i // char sbrin rol pa'i sgra
T12D4305:387a-9: yi 'byung gnas rab mtho dud la sogs rnams dal
T12D4305:387a-10: bar mi bgrod khyod kyi mthu stobs mchog gi 'dir
T12D4305:387a-11: ni rgyal gyur cig / rab tu rgyas pa'i gser
T12D4305:387a-12: gyi padma'i skal bzang brten pa'i sku can rten byed
T12D4305:387a-13: rnams la mun par nyi ma'i dngos po sbyin mdzad
T12D4305:387a-14: kyis // sbrul lta'i // pa // sa gsum zhi
T12D4305:387a-15: ba sgrub pa'i ched du mya ngan 'das pa bzlog
T12D4305:387a-16: mdzad ta ma la yi dbyibs can srid pa'i dgra
T12D4305:387a-18: mgon po stobs bcu pa yi sras kyi tshogs kyi
T12D4305:387a-19: mchog gyur nges par 'khrugs pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad
T12D4305:387a-20: khyod la de ltar bstod pa yis //
T12D4305:387a-21: gang zhig rab bsags dge ba'i phung po chen po
T12D4305:387a-22: de las skye bo'i tshogs pa mtha' dag la yang
T12D4305:387a-24: bdag kyang khyod kyi zhabs pad mngon bar mnyes par
T12D4305:387a-25: bye dpa'i dbang gyur blo yi nang gi mun pa
T12D4305:387a-26: yang dag nges par 'gags pa skyes pa //
T12D4305:387a-27: mtha' dag dngos po'i phung po la khyab 'dris pa
T12D4305:387a-28: rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i
T12D4305:387a-29: de nyid yang dag rtogs pa //
T12D4305:387a-30: brtse med rnams la brtse ba'i stobs dang mi bzlogs
T12D4305:387a-31: brtson 'grus skyes dang rnam pa sna tshogs bya ba
T12D4305:387a-32: brtsams pas bdud rnams nub byed spyad tshul //
T12D4305:387a-33: srid pa gsum la mchog tu phan pa gcig bu'i
T12D4305:387a-34: bya ba can ni skye bo gcig mgrol ba ji
T12D4305:387a-35: srid du yang spyad par bgyi'o //
T12D4305:387a-36: rab rgyas thang gi chu skyes bkram dang mtshungs pa
T12D4305:387a-37: 'dzin pa'i zhabs gdan mthar ni lha dang klu dang
T12D4305:387a-38: lha min dbang po'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od zer
T12D4305:387a-39: tshogs kyis mdzes pa ngal so //
T12D4305:387a-40: bzod dka' mchog tu che ba'i sdug bsngal mes nyams
T12D4305:387a-41: nus pa 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gsum po mya ngan
T12D4305:387a-42: bral bar byas la ngal dang ngal so med pa'i
T12D4305:387a-43: spyod pa rmad byung gter gyur //
T12D4305:387a-44: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs rgyud dag pa'i
T12D4305:387a-45: rgyan du rab gsal grags ba rgyas pas phyogs kyi
T12D4305:387a-46: khongs dag khyab pa gzhon nu ngag gi dbang phyug
T12D4305:387a-47: bzlog par dka' ba bdud kyi //
T12D4305:387a-48: dpa' bo'i dmag dpung kun gyi spro ba 'jigs par
T12D4305:387b-0: byed la mngon par @387b dga' dang ldan pa'i mnyam
T12D4305:387b-1: med nus pa bkod pas shin tu rab gdung byed
T12D4305:387b-2: pa shar 'dis rgyal bar gyur cig / stobs ldan
T12D4305:387b-3: rdo rje btsun mo mchog gi yan lag rnams su
T12D4305:387b-4: yongs su bskyod pas rnam bar rol mdzad gsog gso
T12D4305:387b-5: ba tshogs las 'gro ba rgyal ba'i go cha//
T12D4305:387b-6: rgyu mar bcas shing zhag bcas khrag dang chang gi
T12D4305:387b-7: btung bas rnam par myos pas ma bsdams rnam 'gyur
T12D4305:387b-8: gang rgyangs cher ba gad lha dang lha min skrag
T12D4305:387b-9: mdzad // thugs brtse ba dang shin tu sbyor ba
T12D4305:387b-10: ngo mtshar rang bzhin dpe zla med pa'i drag po'i
T12D4305:387b-11: sku can gnyis med rgya mtsho chen por ngas bar
T12D4305:387b-12: mdzad // zhugs pa // yon tan dag pa'i gzhir
T12D4305:387b-13: gyur rgya che'i gar gyi nyams dgu rnams dang ldan
T12D4305:387b-14: pa rol pa'i spyod tshul can gyur thugs rje'i stobs
T12D4305:387b-16: zhes pa bya dka'i bye brag britta m'a la'i bstod par mnyam pa'i pritta rnams so //
T12D4305:387b-17: thugs rje'i dbang gis 'jug pa'i tshul can khyod kyi sku //
T12D4305:387b-18: shar ka min pa'i ri bod can gyi 'od can byed //
T12D4305:387b-19: phyed ni nyi ma shar ka'i gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa 'dis //
T12D4305:387b-20: su yi yid ni 'dzin par mi bgyid lags //
T12D4305:387b-21: myur ba de nyid bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis tshim pa'i khyad par dang //
T12D4305:387b-22: mtha' dag kun du bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub dbang las kyang ni //
T12D4305:387b-23: khyod kyi zhabs dag nyams su myong ba'i blo gros med pa rung //
T12D4305:387b-24: 'byung bya min no sdig pa 'joms pa rigs pa kva ye //
T12D4305:387b-25: gtso bo 'gro la phan pa gal te khyod kyis ni //
T12D4305:387b-26: gzigs pa bdud rtsi'i ro yi rgyun dang do shal mdzes pas //
T12D4305:387b-27: khyab par byas pas dkar la mtho ba de rnams kyis //
T12D4305:387b-28: lus 'gyur na ni mkhas pa rnams kyi lhag pa ci 'dod //
T12D4305:387b-29: zhal gyi dpal ni rgyas bar gyur pa mchog 'di thugs rje //
T12D4305:387b-30: chen po'i blo can gnyug ma'i blo gros dpal gyi bcud rnams dang //
T12D4305:387b-31: yan dag ldan zhing g-yo ba'i mchu yi 'dab ma can ni //
T12D4305:387b-32: shin tu yid 'phrog gser gyi chus kyes rgyas 'dod bzhin du snang //
T12D4305:387b-33: khyod kyi zhal bzang gzhan 'di autpal bsdams pa yi //
T12D4305:387b-34: mdzes pa rnams ni yang dag bsags pa bzhin du snang zhing //
T12D4305:387b-35: zhal ras gzhan pa ku mu ta ye dpal gyis ni //
T12D4305:387b-36: yang dag bskyed pa bzhin te 'di 'dras yid 'phrong mdzad do //
T12D4305:387b-37: 'gro ba gsum las rgyal ba'i ngang can khyod kyis ni //
T12D4305:387b-38: rol pa 'di yang byis pa'i rol pa'o gang phyir la lar //
T12D4305:387b-39: don sgrub pa ni thams cad bskyod phyir khyod kyis ni //
T12D4305:387b-40: spyod pa'i tshul 'di ae ma phyed mnyam pa ru mthong ngo //
T12D4305:388a-1: gcig la stobs kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi //
T12D4305:388a-2: rtse mo kun nas gnon pa khyod kyi zhal mthong nas //
T12D4305:388a-3: kun gyi dag ni rang gi bran mo bzhin du //
T12D4305:388a-4: khyod la snyan par smra bar ci ltar mi 'gyur lags //
T12D4305:388a-5: khyod kyi thugs rje gal te shugs ldan mi 'gyur //
T12D4305:388a-6: na ni rang gi ngang gis 'byung ba'i zhi ba'i lam //
T12D4305:388a-7: bsal nas blo ldan gyis kyang rtogs par dka' ba'i //
T12D4305:388a-8: spyod pa shin tu ngo mtshar brgya yis ci zhig lags //
T12D4305:388a-9: kun las khyad par 'phags pa'i gzi brjid kyi gnas //
T12D4305:388a-10: yan lag kun khyab mtshon sla mtshan gyi dpal ldan zhing //
T12D4305:388a-11: bzang po rnam par gsal ba khyod sku kun gyis //
T12D4305:388a-12: dran par gyur bas kyang ni bzang po rgyas par mdzad //
T12D4305:388a-13: gzhan don mchog tu don gnyer rnams kyis khyod sku
T12D4305:388a-14: kun nas 'phro zhing mngon par dga' 'os 'od zer
T12D4305:388a-15: gyi // rang bzhin rdo rje padma ral gri nor bu //
T12D4305:388a-16: 'khor lo rnams kyi tog dang ldan par rnam par snang //
T12D4305:388a-17: sems skams tsam gyis dngo sbo bsten pa'i snying rje
T12D4305:388a-18: la ni phun tshogs gzhan dang gzhan min don 'di
T12D4305:388a-20: de 'di khyod kyi dbyibs kyis dor te de phyir cha shas //
T12D4305:388a-21: sgra dang ldan pa'i rkyen dang bud med rtags kyis brjod pa'o //
T12D4305:388a-22: 'char bzhin pa yi skya rengs rnams kyi 'od zer tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i //
T12D4305:388a-23: gser gyi rang bzhin dri ma dang bral kha ba'i 'od las nges rgyal ba //
T12D4305:388a-24: 'gro ba ma lus mngon par dga' bar byed la mkhas shing shin tu mdzes pa //
T12D4305:388a-25: khyod kyi sku lus 'di yis rgyal bar gyur cig shin tu byung ba kye //
T12D4305:388a-26: srid pa gsum gyis rtogs par dka' ba'ang zhabs la
T12D4305:388a-27: yongs su rgyu ba can gyi rnal 'byor lci ba
T12D4305:388a-28: bcom ldan bde bar gshegs pa dkar po ma yin
T12D4305:388a-29: pa'i // gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs dri ma rnam par
T12D4305:388a-30: bral ba'i nor bu nges par bsags pas spras phyir
T12D4305:388a-31: legs par yongs su 'byor ba'i yon tan rnams kyi
T12D4305:388a-32: pa'i // gnas // rang gi tshul lugs rjod par
T12D4305:388a-33: byed pa'i sgra ni zhum pa brjod pa yang dag
T12D4305:388a-34: rjes su byed la ro can lta bu'i lha yi
T12D4305:388a-36: yongs su byugs pa'i dri bzang gis 'dus bung ba'i
T12D4305:388a-37: tshogs kyi 'phungs gter khyod kyi gtsug gi phud kyis
T12D4305:388a-38: rgyal bar gyur cig rtogs pa'i chu gter gyi //
T12D4305:388a-39: yang dag dar ba'i phyogs la 'dod pa nye bar
T12D4305:388a-40: bab ba rnams la yang dag dar bar byed pa
T12D4305:388a-41: rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rjod byed cing //
T12D4305:388a-42: rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba'i rol ro myong blo
T12D4305:388a-43: can rnam la dpe zla med pa'i zhi ba'i bde
T12D4305:388a-44: ba'i lam rjod byed la ltur len chen po can
T12D4305:388a-45: // dpag tu med pa'i legs par byas pa'i 'bras
T12D4305:388a-46: bu blo can rnams la nges par drang zhing gya
T12D4305:388b-0: gyu'i blon can rnams la phul @388b du ni //
T12D4305:388b-1: dbyung du med pa'i 'khyog pa'i tshig can khyod kyi
T12D4305:388b-2: gsung gis rgyal bar gyur cig lhag pa'i bdag po
T12D4305:388b-3: rgyal ba'i tshul gyi 'dren byed bdud rtsi'i khang ba
T12D4305:388b-4: kye // gang zhig khyod la bstod cing khyod kyi yon tan rnams //
T12D4305:388b-5: kun nas bshad pa 'di zhes mngon par rlom byed pa //
T12D4305:388b-6: de ni nges par 'khur ba gang ba'i chu ldan bas //
T12D4305:388b-7: bdag gi chu gter nges par 'thungs so zhes pa nyid //
T12D4305:388b-8: 'o na kyang dran pa'i dgra bo ma lus rnams kyis kyang //
T12D4305:388b-9: brjod bya nyid ni brjod mi spyod pa mgon khyod kyi //
T12D4305:388b-10: yon tan rnams la don med mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
T12D4305:388b-11: brjod pa 'di ni phyin ci log pa snga ma can //
T12D4305:388b-12: zhes pa 'jug tshul phreng ba phyed mnyam pa'i britta rnams so //
T12D4305:388b-13: yon tan rgya mtsho skabs gzhan rnams su //
T12D4305:388b-14: rgya mtsho ma bskams brgyad po zhabs kyis te por btsir las //
T12D4305:388b-15: 'phel pa rnams kyis sor mo'i khung bu gang ba min zhing bzod bya min pa //
T12D4305:388b-16: zhabs can mi mnyam pa ni rkang pa bzhi po
T12D4305:388b-17: gong ma can gyi thugs rje'i dgongs pa thob byed
T12D4305:388b-18: // ces pas nges par bsgrags pa'i rang bzhin //
T12D4305:388b-19: mi zad zhabs kyi bkod pa bya zhing yang ba dang ni //
T12D4305:388b-20: lci ba'i nges pa 'dzin la gal te khyod kyis nges par mngon par smre sngags //
T12D4305:388b-21: tshig sgrub pa la rjes su gdung bar mi 'gyur
T12D4305:388b-22: ba ni 'jigs par 'gyur ba min pa su yin
T12D4305:388b-23: // ma rungs skye bo 'dul bar byed cing //
T12D4305:388b-24: rnam par gtsigs pa'i sku lus ston par mdzad pa khyod kyis //
T12D4305:388b-25: me tog kha 'bus 'di ni grong gsum 'phrog pa'i cod pan nor bu 'dra dang //
T12D4305:388b-26: shin tu yun rings pan pa'i blo gros nges par
T12D4305:388b-27: mdzad pa'i sdong bu'i myu gu bzhin du snang ngo
T12D4305:388b-28: // khyod kyi spyan gyis cung zad gtad pa'i rol ba rab tu //
T12D4305:388b-29: stobs ldan mngon par mngon par phyogs pas me chen stug po 'jigs su rung ba'i //
T12D4305:388b-30: dra ba rab tu rgyas pa'i nam mkha'i mthil du
T12D4305:388b-31: bar mtshams med pa 'dzin par byed cing gshin rje
T12D4305:388b-32: // yang ni rab tu zhi bar mdzad do //
T12D4305:388b-33: 'di ni kho na sdig pa drag po dug gi phung po //
T12D4305:388b-34: mtha' dag rab tu zhi byas slar yang skye bo 'jam po'i rjes su yang dang //
T12D4305:388b-35: yang du mngon par gsar ba'i bde ba mnyam pa
T12D4305:388b-36: med pa'i gter dag kun du 'dren par byed cing
T12D4305:388b-37: // nges par gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun lags //
T12D4305:388b-38: dbang po sku lus chu gter phung po glog gis //
T12D4305:388b-39: mchog tu 'bar zhing chu yi khur gyis ljid la //
T12D4305:388b-40: 'jigs rung 'brug sgra che ldan thugs rje lci yang gis //
T12D4305:388b-41: 'gro ba rgyun du 'phags pa 'di yis rgyal gyur
T12D4305:388b-42: cig /'di nyid phyir na shin tu bya ba dka'
T12D4305:388b-43: ba yi // rnam par rol pa brgya rnams rgyas par mdzad pa //
T12D4305:388b-44: khyod kyis gsal bar grags pa'i dri bzang nyid kyis //
T12D4305:389a-1: 'jig rten ma lus tshim par mdzad //
T12D4305:389a-2: khro gnyer gzigs stangs can gyi tshems rnams la ni //
T12D4305:389a-3: rnam par 'gyur rnams ci yang rnam par 'dzin pa //
T12D4305:389a-4: khyod kyi sku lus rgyal bar gyur cing 'on kyang
T12D4305:389a-5: gang zhig / mi bzad 'di 'dra ba yis 'jig
T12D4305:389a-6: rten pa rnams 'dul bar mdzad la //
T12D4305:389a-7: ri yi bya skyibs 'jigs pa rmad byung phul byung de 'dra ba yang //
T12D4305:389a-8: 'gro la mi phan gzhom pa'i ched du kun du mnyam du ni //
T12D4305:389a-9: khyod kyis dal bur gshegs pa rol pa dang //
T12D4305:389a-10: bcas la'ang phul du dbyung du med pa'i mgyogs ldan rlung gi rjes 'gro min //
T12D4305:389a-11: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi khyu mchog rlabs po che'i //
T12D4305:389a-12: gnas ni mtshungs pa med pa //
T12D4305:389a-13: dag par snang ba'i khyad par can //
T12D4305:389a-14: 'dzin pa khyod ni rten du thob pa de //
T12D4305:389a-15: de phyir gzhan pa mi mnyam rnams kyi //
T12D4305:389a-16: mgo bor rkang pa nges par 'jog / bsam pa gcig pa phun sum tshogs pas //
T12D4305:389a-18: dge ba dri ma med pa //
T12D4305:389a-19: 'phel pa bzhin pa zhes gang yod pa //
T12D4305:389a-20: de las 'jig rten ma lus 'di rnams shin tu spyod tshul //
T12D4305:389a-22: khyod kyis mngon par dgongs pa'i//
T12D4305:389a-24: mchog tu 'gro bar gyur cig / gzhan yang /
T12D4305:389a-25: nges par 'dod bya dri ma med pas //
T12D4305:389a-28: rab tu bsags par byas pas //
T12D4305:389a-34: rnam par bral gyur cig / gzhan yang //
T12D4305:389a-35: stobs ldan shes rab rab dkar //
T12D4305:389a-41: rang bzhin lta bu'i lus ni //
T12D4305:389a-42: phul du dbyung du med pa'i //
T12D4305:389a-51: dri med bsags pa gang yin //
T12D4305:389a-62: bya dka' ba'i khyad par 'jug tshul gyi phreng ba //
T12D4305:389a-63: mkhas pa chen po gnas brtan ye shes dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T12D4305:389a-65: // /'di yi ge bcu gnyis pa'i tshigs bcad bcu gnyis pa ya mun yan chad /
T12D4305:389a-66: shong ston lo ts'a ba chen po rdo rje rgyal
T12D4305:389a-67: mtshan gyis bsgyur te 'phro la lus pa las shong
T12D4305:389a-68: ston de nyid kyi brgyud pa'i slob ma dpang lo
T12D4305:389a-69: ts'a ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas
T12D4305:389a-70: / slob dpon sh'akya rakshi tas mdzad pa'i 'grel pa la brten nas /
